Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat\(security\): implement backend-first security architecture with Edge Functions

- Add 7 secure Edge Functions for all write operations:
  - deduct-credits: Secure credit deduction with JWT validation
  - get-credits: Read-only credits fetch
  - save-project: Secure project save with ownership verification
  - delete-project: Secure project delete with ownership verification
  - save-storyboard: Secure storyboard save
  - save-asset: Secure asset save with URL validation
  - delete-asset: Secure asset delete with ownership verification

- Add RLS migration to lock down all tables to read-only from frontend:
  - user_credits, credit_transactions, projects, assets, storyboards, generations

- Update all contexts to use Edge Functions instead of direct DB access:
  - CreditsContext, ProjectContext, StoryboardContext, AssetContext

- Add authentication system:
  - AuthContext for auth state management
  - AuthPage \(signin/signup/forgot-password\)
  - AuthCallbackPage for OAuth redirects
  - ResetPasswordPage for password reset

- Add industry tools and pages:
  - Real Estate tools \(VirtualStaging, ItemRemoval, etc.\)
  - Auto Dealership tools \(SpotRemoval, PaintColor, etc.\)
  - Storyboard editor components

- Add credits system with types and context

Security follows @burakeregar''s backend-first architecture:
- Frontend can only READ via RLS
- All writes go through Edge Functions with service role
- JWT validated server-side, user_id extracted from token

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
